metadata.name: Suspicious Reg Add Open Command
metadata.comment: Threat actors performed dumping of SAM, SECURITY and SYSTEM registry hives using DelegateExecute key

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkcu\\\\software\\\\classes\\\\ms-settings\\\\shell\\\\open\\\\command')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/ve ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkcu\\\\software\\\\classes\\\\ms-settings\\\\shell\\\\open\\\\command')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('delegateexecute')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('delete')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkcu\\\\software\\\\classes\\\\ms-settings'))))

output.summary: Threat actors performed dumping of SAM, SECURITY and SYSTEM registry hives using DelegateExecute key
